Cloudfoundry Buildpack Dashboard

One stop dashboard for monitoring buildpack usage

You are provided with two main views Buildpacks and Organisations.

Each entry in the list will offer a summary of the related applications in the form of a badge: running 2 total 3. where running indicates the number of running applications under the selected entry and total the total.

Some applications are marked with an (A) flag, indicating that your buildpack was autodetected (not specified in the app manifest).

A yellow button: indicates a running application. A red button: a stopped one. Enjoy!
